resources.string: Choose which numberal is greater?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.

"Congratulations, the level 1 is completed!\n Do you know that the number 7 is the happiest number? There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents, 7 musical notes, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 days of Creation and much more ...\n Also, the number 7 is often the favorite number of people all around the world."
Choose which Roman numberal is greater?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
"Congratulations, the level 2 is completed!\n Do you know that in Roman numerals there is no digit zero?"
Which animal is bigger?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
"Congratulations, the level 3 is completed!\n A larger creature is not necessarily a predators, usually they are herbivores.
Edible / Non Edible\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.

"Congratulations, the level 4 is completed!\n It is known that many crocodiles swallow stones. But isn't because they are edible for them, stones help crocodails to sink into the water quickly and help stay at the bottom.
Which card is stronger?\n Questions might repeat until you rich 20 pt.
"Congratulations, the level 5 is completed!\n Do you know in some card games the strength of the cards is looped and the deuce hits the ace?
